entry.title: Bridge returned error 400! (18862)
entry.content:
Twitter @Sanctuary4AllCO was unable to receive or process the remote website's content!
Error message: `The requested resource cannot be found!
Please make sure your input parameters are correct!
cUrl error: (0)
PHP error: `
Query string: `action=display&bridge=Twitter&context=By+username&u=Sanctuary4AllCO&norep=on&nopic=on&noimg=on&format=Atom`
Version: `dev.2020-02-26`

  • Press Return to check your input parameters
  • Press F5 to retry
  • Check if this issue was already reported on GitHub (give it a thumbs-up)
  • Open a GitHub Issue if this error persists

pmaziere

entry.title: we are in a new locación , we ask you to continue supporting...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

we are in a new locación , we ask you to continue supporting each impacted family, our new locación is in metro caring , 1100 e 18 ave denver co 80218, 5 minutes from the church where we were. at the same time from 1 to 3

Lupe is selling gorditas this weekend to raise money for a necessary surgery to treat a hernia. Without insurance, she’s been ineligible to even schedule the su...rgery until it got worse, and she still has to raise the money to pay for it and take time off work afterward. Buying gorditas, and sharing the sale with family and friends, is one way you can help. Order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co.

entry.title: Lupe is selling gorditas this weekend to raise money for a...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Lupe is selling gorditas this weekend to raise money for a necessary surgery to treat a hernia. Without insurance, she’s been ineligible to even schedule the surgery until it got worse, and she still has to raise the money to pay for it and take time off work afterward. Buying gorditas, and sharing the sale with family and friends, is one way you can help. Order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co.

entry.title: Orale Carnales y Rudegirls! Tonight, Karaoke night at Cheluna...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Orale Carnales y Rudegirls!
Tonight, Karaoke night at Cheluna Brewing Company 7pm.

Y mañana Regresa Roka Hueka al Stanley Marketplace a las 8pm!

...

Let's enjoy Life and sing along!

entry.title: Memories
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado shared a memory.

Memories

3 Years AgoSee Your Memorieschevron-rightJeanette Vizguerra is with Luz Garcia and Elvira Arellano in Chicago, Illinois.

Gracias a cada persona que me hicieron sentir increible cin sus atenciones en Chicago dias de conocer gente nueva creando conecciones y lazos de apoyo mutuo gra...cias Luz Garcia pir la invitacion y cada dia hasta el mas sabio aprende cosas nuevas gracias por poner en mi vida mujeres guerreras Cecilia Garcia. Elvira Arellano. Ana Burciaga. Emma lozano. Pastora Jacobita. Pastor Gustavo y pastora Maria medina. Pastora Lucrecia Mercado. Taina Rodriguez Constituent Advocate and Congresista Jan Schakowsky al Cinsul de Mex en Chicago fueron dias productivos donde pude ver a mis primos Eva. Y Juanma Ramirez hasta la proxima.

See More+10

entry.title: Protest in solidarity with Afghanistan! Please show up if you...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Protest in solidarity with Afghanistan! Please show up if you can.

Alt image: Emergency Protest in black, bolded letters, followed by a Black fist with black, red, and green explosion behind it. The wrist has the Afghanistan flag wrapped around it. Near the bottom are black, red, and green handprints layered on top of each other.

Information on protest as followed:...
August 19, 2021
Gather at 6 P.M. for a rally followed by a march.

Colorado State Capitol
200 E Colfax Ave. Denver, CO 80203

We march on Afghanistan's national day of independence demanding an end to proxy wars, forced displacements, and the recent terrors unleashed upon Afghanistan.

Mask and carpooling encouraged.
Parking available along Lincoln Ave and Sherman St.

Contact: Zmhashem0209@gmail.com

See More

entry.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All ColoradoThank you for all the support you have given us with the solidarity meals program during this...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado

Thank you for all the support you have given us with the solidarity meals program during this year and 3 months, we inform you that we are in the process of cha...nging direction and that is why this week we will not have food because we are planning the inauguration of the new place . On August 21, follow us to find out about the event, and continue supporting the families. Thanks a lot

See More

entry.title: Sanctuary4All Colorado updated their profile picture.
entry.content: Sanctuary4All Colorado updated their profile picture.

entry.title: Thank you for all the support you have given us with the...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Thank you for all the support you have given us with the solidarity meals program during this year and 3 months, we inform you that we are in the process of changing direction and that is why this week we will not have food because we are planning the inauguration of the new place . On August 21, follow us to find out about the event, and continue supporting the families. Thanks a lot

We’re moving locations for Solidarity Meals soon, and as a show of thanks for the space that the First Unitarian Society of Denver has provided us over the last... year, this week’s sale is raising money for the church. You can support by ordering flautas at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co.

entry.title: We’re moving locations for Solidarity Meals soon, and as a...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

We’re moving locations for Solidarity Meals soon, and as a show of thanks for the space that the First Unitarian Society of Denver has provided us over the last year, this week’s sale is raising money for the church. You can support by ordering flautas at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co.

entry.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.This week we’re raising money for the First Unitarian Society of...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

This week we’re raising money for the First Unitarian Society of Denver, the church that has hosted the Solidarity Meals program for the last year. All of he mo...ney raised this week will go toward the church as a thanks to the space they’ve done graciously offered us. You can order flautas at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co

See More

entry.title: all impacted families will be gathering to cook to thank the...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

all impacted families will be gathering to cook to thank the church for the year the church opened its doors for solidarity meals and we need your support and collaboration so that we can give a good donation to the church buying food please help and share

entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

This week we’re raising money for the First Unitarian Society of Denver, the church that has hosted the Solidarity Meals program for the last year. All of he money raised this week will go toward the church as a thanks to the space they’ve done graciously offered us. You can order flautas at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co

entry.title: After you pick up your tania enchiladas, I invite you to bring...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

After you pick up your tania enchiladas, I invite you to bring something sweet (flan 🍮) for your dessert and a delicious fresh water !!

entry.title: Tania is selling enchiladas again, and according to Laszlo, they...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Tania is selling enchiladas again, and according to Laszlo, they come with the best of all possible rices. Place your order today at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co. Pickup is on Saturday, July 31, in capitol hill.
